name: More than the previous one by a factor of 7
instruction:
Create a `level1` variable and assign any number between 1 and 10 to it.

Create a second variable `levelUp`, which will be 7 times larger than `level1`.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do, but adapt it to the requirements of the task:

```javascript
const before = 2;
const after = before * 4;
```
